notes:
Another month of unsettled weather seems to be the blueprint for July.

Not too hot early in the month, so hedgehogs are happy to visit for food ü¶î

A hot spell towards the end of the month detered hedgehogs, but mice attended üê≠

June is here, starting wet like May, before the weather came warmer with hedgehog visits. ü¶î

Squirrel footage was captured on 19th of June too! üêøÔ∏è

May has begun with a temperature uplift, spring may have finally sprung! Hedgehogs visiting regularly. ü¶î

See Tuesday the 28th of May for some Fox Footage! ü¶ä
It's April! The weather is sporadic, but with lots of hedgehog visits ü¶î Mice visiting lots too üêÅ

The first hedgehog of the spring visited on the 12th of March, with more visits on subsequent days ü¶î

Lots of Mice activity throughout the month üêÅ

Not all cameras back in use after winter yet / sporadic availability üõ†Ô∏è

Will the hedgehogs return from hibernation this month?

None have visited yet, though a Polecat made an appearnce on the 16th ü¶¶
It's quiet in here, awaiting the end of hibernation. Check out the visiting badger on 17th though ü¶°

The month of December started with sub-zero temperatures, in the daytime as well as at overnight!

Hedgehogs hibernating. Occasional visits, or mice footage, may feature.

Just as in late October, there have been no hedgehog sightings.

Winter hibernation has likely begun.

A busy start to October. The food offering is now back to the classic cat biscuits.

Lots of foraging in the grass too, squirrels have been hiding things in preparation for winter.

The weather has proved quite variable. Hot, Cold, Wet, Windy.

Hedgehogs absent towards the month end. Though earlier than last year, hibernation may have begun.

Hungry hedgehogs are finishing all, or most, of the food on offer this month.

The month started sunny, with a heatwave, before giving way to more rainy weather.

A new camera, the UsoGood TC30, is now commissioned and has produced it's first footage.

ü¶° Badger Attack! See footage from the 23rd September. A badger attempted entry to the hedgehog house!

August began with not so many 'in house' visits, after a very wet July, but instead lots of foraging in the garden.

Certain days have produced no footage at all. The weather has been very random this summer!

More visits towards the month end, perhaps fattening up for the Autumn / Winter has begun.

The hot start to summer, through May and June, has given way to heavy rain through much of July (so far).

This is affecting hedgehog visits, which have often been days apart (particularly indoor 'hedgehog house' visits).

Hot summer nights are resulting in a lot less hedgehog visits, and less predicatable arrival times.

Much needed rain arrived towards the end of the month, and visits ended on a high note.

Like late April, May has started off quietly, with just a few 'house' visits per day from hedgehogs.

It would then be sporadic, busy some days, quiet on other days. No visits on very hot nights.

Plenty walking about in the garden still though, likely foraging for natural food options.

Hedgehogs visiting daily, and exploring the wider garden!

There appeared to be a lot of feeding / re-fuelling, after Winter.

... and some interaction!, see 12th of April at 00:44:12.

Visits appeared to tail off towards the month end, perhaps the hedgehogs were getting full, or had started nesting.

Hedgehogs emerged from hibernation in March 2023, with footage available from the 6th of March.

By the month end, hedgehogs were back visiting daily, with lots of big and small hogs spotted in the garden.

February 2023 proved to be another 'No Hedgehogs' month, but we had mice visiting.

The downtime gave a good opportunity to work on many tech and performance improvements.

Like the previous few months, for hedgehogs, check out November 2022.

The hedgehogs have started the year in hibernation. Mice are the only visitors.

For lots of Hedgehogs, please check out November 2022.

Website launch month, and aside from the 1st December, the hedgehogs snubbed the party!

On the following days, only mice would visit.

For lots of Hedgehogs, please check out November.
November 2022 was yet again a busy month, for both hedgehogs and mice.
October 2022 proved to be a very busy month for visiting hedgehogs.

A lot of the entries early in September are videos of mice - the original visitors to the hedgehog house!

Hedgehog footage begins from 13th September.

Also includes the first spotted footage of 2 hedgehogs, on the 29th September, starting at the 22:33 clip.
Cameras first setup in August 2022, and the very first recordings of our spiky friends are captured!
